Riohacha.\n Its beauty is synonymous of exuberance, the exotic prevails

The town ofRiohacha has a population of 167.865 people 
 These 137.629 lives in urban zone and 30.236 in rural zone 
 Riohacha has in mayorty indian population, Riohacha has 33.647 Wayuu Indian 
 and 9.900 Wiwa and Kogui indian population
We are located in the heart of la Guajira. Our guest enjoying a unique experience of know the essence of the Wayuu culture
Taroa Lifestyle Hotel represents the new concept of boutique hotels : small, intimate , modern and economic , emphasizing the care and quality in each of their services.

This exceptional location easily accessible to visitors, combines the tropical rainforest with endless kilometers of white sandy beaches and warm sea , in a magical setting supported by the ancestral legacy of the ancient Tayrona
This combination between nature and comfort of a hotel, allows us to offer our guests spacious and comfortable villas for 2 , 4 and 6, recreational activities inside the hotel, variety of food.
Generous portions and good atmosphere. The place is clean and has a good reputation
The yotojoro restaurant " Cactus Heart " in Wayuunaiki. It offers seafood delicacies , Monsignor snapper is exquisite , lemonade and coconut seafood casseroles are simply delicious
Drinks and delicious meals. The barman , chef and waiters are offering the best service.
It is a restaurant bar with a quiet atmosphere, good music , good service, and very tasty food
Cooled by the trade winds from the north, this bridge is located at the mouth of the River Rancheria . From there you can see a beautiful sunset.
It was built in 1937 and has 12,000 meters long. It is made by a beautiful travel where tourists enjoy the gentle breeze.
It is the favorite meeting place for the riohacheros to enjoy the sunset . Within its beautiful architecture is a monument to Admiral Padilla.
Are located in the Round Point of the street 15
Extends for all de 1a street. While you walk you can find little shops of sea food
